summary:
Many spells, enchantments, potions and scrolls available to buy from a specific vendor.
Note that some of these are powerful and thus gamebreaking.
descriptionHtml:
My more magic mod adds several new spells, enchantments, potions and scrolls to the game.
I have added a merchant in Bannered Mare that sell all this stuff :)
Enchantment restrictions have been removed.

No other mod or DLC required.

This mod add the following:

Spells:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Waterbreathing 24H' (breath under water for 24 hours)
Waterwalking 24H' (walk on water for 24 hours)
Fortify Carry Capacity 24H' (increase carry capacity for 24 hours)
Invisibility 24H' (invisible for 24 hours)
Ethereal 24H' (ethereal for 24 hours)
Slow Time 24H' (slows time for 24 hours)
Speed 24H' (increased speed for 24 hours)
Muffle 24H' (muffle effect for 24 hours)
Fortify Creation Skills' (fortify smithing, enchanting and alchemy)
Fortify Stealth Skills' (fortify lockpicking, pickpocket and sneak)
Deathspell (cause severe amount of damage to target)
Drain (drain life, magic and stamina)
Detect All (combination of all detect spells)
Bound Pickaxe (conjure a pickaxe)
Summon Chicken (summon an aggressive chicken)
Summon Drac of BirraBrothers (summon a daedra type creature)
Summoned Creature Dispel (dispel any previously summoned creature)
Magic Arrow (shoot arrow from your hand)
Force Push (unrelenting force in spell form)
Transmute Iron Ore to Lockpick (iron ore to lockpick and vice versa)
Transmute Gold to Iron Ore (cheap way of getting iron ore)
All Heal (heal health, magic and stamina to max)
Merchant Charm (able to sell / buy any to all merchants)
PowerUp (make you very powerful)
Lock Insight (any lock is easier to open and lockpicks are unbreakable)
Smithing Insight (smith anything while the effect of the spell is active)
Disarm (disarm opponent)
Weakness to All (make opponent weak to fire, frost and shock)
Fireball Improved (better fireball with unrelenting force effect :D )

Spells marked with ' have a specific dispel spell to remove the effect.
While not all spells have scrolls, most do.

Potions:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Elixir of Strength Plus (fortify Carry Weight 100 points)
Elixir of Alchemy Plus (Fortify Alchemy Skill 50 points)
Elixir of Enchanting Plus (Fortify Enchanting skill 50 points)
Elixir of Lockpicking Plus (Fortify Lockpicking skill 100 points)
Elixir of Pickpocketing Plus (Fortify Pickpocket skill 100 points)
Blacksmith's Elixir Plus (Fortify Smithing skill 100 points)
Elixir of Light Feet Plus (Fortify Sneak skill 50 points)
Potion of Ultimate Restoration (Restore health, stamina, magicka)
Alchemy Insight Potion (Learn every effect from ingredients)
Increased Speed Potion (Increase speed)
Slow Time Potion (Slows Time)
Elixir of Waterbreathing Plus (Breath under water)
Waterwalking Potion (Ability to walk on water)
Elixir of Resist Magic Plus (Resist magic)
Elixir of Lasting Potency Plus (Magic regen)
Elixir of Vigor Plus (Stamina regen)
Elixir of Enhanced Constituation (Fortify health, stamina, magicka)
Deadly Paralysis Poison Plus (Paralysis)
Elixir of Resist All (Resist fire, frost and shock)
Deadly Aversion to All (Weakness fire, frost and shock)
Cure Poison and Disease (Cure poison and disease)
Power Up Aqua (Increased damage output and speed)
Deadly Dragon Poison (Cause extra damage to dragons)
Deadly Undead Poison (Cause extra damage to undead)

Enchantments:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fortify Alchemy Improved (Fortify Alchemy)
Fortify Regeneration Rates (Fortify regen rates (all) and carry)
Fortify Enchanting Improved (Fortify Enchantment)
Fortify Lockpicking Improved (Fortify Lockpicking)
Fortify Pickpocket Improved (Fortify Pickpocket)
Fortify Smithing Improved (Fortify Smithing)
Fortify Speed (Increased speed)
Resist Disease and Poison (Resist both and waterbreathing)
Resist Magic Improved (Resist magic)
Fortify Carry Weight Improved (Fortify Carry Weight)
Improved Damage (Fortify Melee Damage (10 %))
Absorb All (Absorb health, stamina and magic)
Stagger Paralysis (Stagger and Paralysis)
Void Damage Fire (Fire Weakness and damage)
Void Damage Frost (Frost Weakness and damage)
Void Damage Shock (Shock Weakness and damage)
Void Damage Undead (Do extra damage to undead)
Void Damage Dragons (Do extra damage to dragons)
Fortify Magic Schools (All spells cost less to cast)
Forced Impact (Add unrelenting force to target)
Visual Effect cracks (Glowing Cracks)
Visual Effect Steam (Steam)
Visual Effect Fire (Fire)
Visual Effect Frost (Frost)
Visual Effect Shock (Electric)


This is probably not for all, don't use if you don't like it : )
